sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Hans Anuku onye na-eme ejije Nollywood kọọrọ BBC Igbo ihe iribama ndị mmadụ amaghị maka ya mbụ.
Otu n'ime ha bụ na ya bụ ụkọchukwu n'ihi na onyeisi ụlọụka Redeem bụ Pastor Enoch Adeboye nyere ya asambodo 'Theology'.
'Anwụ na-achagbu anyị na Nollywood' - Uwaezuoke
Ihe ị maghị maka Ify Onwuemene, onye ihe ejije lara mmụọ
O kwukwara na ya bụ ejima, na ihe ndị ọzọ ọ gwabeghị onye ọbụla mbụ.
Ndị mere akụkọ a bụ Chiagozie Nwonwu na Vining Ogu.
Ụmụntoroọbịa
